mapper.insert: insert into asset( serialnumber, asset_state, reg_date, model, category_code ) values( #{serialnumber}, #{assetState}, current_timestamp(), #{model}, #{categoryCode} )
mapper.select: select a.id, a.serialnumber, a.asset_state, a.reg_date, a.model, a.category_code, ac.category_name from asset a inner join asset_category ac on ac.category_code = a.category_code order by a.reg_date desc
